metadata.name: Suspicious Service Path Modification
metadata.comment: Detects service path modification via the "sc" binary to a suspicious command or path

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\sc.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('config')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('binpath')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('powershell')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cmd ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('mshta')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('wscript')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cscript')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('rundll32')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('svchost')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('dllhost')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cmd.exe /c')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cmd.exe /k')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cmd.exe /r')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cmd /c')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cmd /k')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cmd /r')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('c:\\users\\public')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\downloads\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\desktop\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\microsoft\\windows\\start menu\\programs\\startup\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('c:\\windows\\temp\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\appdata\\local\\temp'))))

output.summary: Detects service path modification via the "sc" binary to a suspicious command or path

metadata.objective: Examine fields: process.cmd_line, process.parent_process.cmd_line False positive: Unlikely References: https://github.com/redcanaryco/atomic-red-team/blob/f339e7da7d05f6057fdfcdd3742bfcf365fee2a9/atomics/T1543.003/T1543.003.md, https://web.archive.org/web/20180331144337/https://www.fireeye.com/blog/threat-research/2018/03/sanny-malware-delivery-method-updated-in-recently-observed-attacks.html
